structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH

law.text: Steam locomotive #152, a 4-6-2 Light Pacific, formerly of the Louisville and Nashville Railroad and restored to operation by the volunteer members of the Kentucky Railway Museum, is named and designated as the official steam locomotive of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
